post.body: For sure... *squee*
Um, now I need to know what you are talking about. :hahahaha
Mmmm... sexy evil... *purrr*
BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAA
No one can resist, baby... just go with the flow.
Don't throw the book... it only messes up your place holder and then you have to read over that part again. *sigh*
Rethinking the whole "read Vampirates for the lulz" idea. It's exactly as horrific as it sounds.
morning. after. ugh.
Mmmm... scotch.
loves holiday marathons. It's all the rage.
I still can't get my twitter and FB to sync. I'm thinking technology is no longer my minion.
tweet tweet
testing
actually visited the mall and returned without thinking violent thoughts.
is wondering why I can only seem to really write between the hours of 10pm and midnight. SIGH
is writing dammit.
thinks Adoralyna should write a book.
is more tired than is strictly necessary.
is sick. Summer colds are hell.
is banging her head against chapter 12.
